food.title: Food Tracking
food.addNewMealDesc: Describe your meal or take a photo, and our AI will calculate the macros for you
food.dateAndTimeHint: You can log meals for any date and time, not just today
food.mealDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Grilled chicken breast with rice and broccoli, medium portion
food.mealDescriptionPlaceholderWithPhoto: Optional: Add details about your meal, or let AI analyze the photo
food.mealDescriptionRequired: Please describe your meal or upload a photo
food.photoHint: üí° With a photo, AI can analyze your meal automatically. Adding a description helps improve accuracy.
food.successMessage: Your meal has been logged and macros calculated.
food.limitReachedHint: üí° Consider upgrading your plan for unlimited AI calculations
food.detailedDescriptionHint: üí° Try adding more details like portion size, cooking method, or ingredients
food.networkHint: üí° Check your internet connection and try again
food.timeoutHint: üí° Try a shorter, more concise description
food.yourFoodEntries: Your food entries for this date
food.noMealsLogged: No meals logged for this date
food.macrosInProgress: Macros calculation in progress or failed
food.macroNote: Note: These calculations are AI-generated estimates based on typical portion sizes and ingredients. For precise tracking, consider using a food scale or consulting nutrition labels.
food.foodDescriptionPlaceholder: Optional: Add details about your meal, or let AI analyze the photo
food.foodDescriptionRequired: Description is required or upload a photo
food.deleteMealEntry: Are you sure you want to delete this meal entry? This action cannot be undone.

activity.title: Activity Tracking
activity.logActivityDesc: Track your physical activities and calories burned
activity.dateAndTimeHint: You can log activities for any date and time, not just today
activity.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Morning run around the park
activity.durationMin: Duration must be at least 1 minute
activity.notesPlaceholder: Any additional notes about your activity...
activity.caloriesBurnedHint: Enter the calories burned from your fitness tracker or watch for more accuracy. If left blank, it will be calculated based on your activity duration and intensity.
activity.noActivitiesForDay: No activities logged for this day
activity.startLogging: Start by logging your first activity!
activity.whenDidYouDoActivity: When did you do this activity?

health.noHealthEntries: No health entries logged for this date
health.bristolType5: Type 5: Soft blobs with clear-cut edges
health.bristolType6: Type 6: Fluffy pieces with ragged edges

weight.title: Weight Entries
weight.subtitle: Track your weight progress over time
weight.trackWeightToday: Let's track your weight for today! This helps monitor your health progress.
weight.weightTrackingInfo: Weight is tracked once per day and helps with health correlation analysis.
weight.weightTrackingTip: üí° Tip: Regular weight tracking helps identify patterns between your diet, health, and weight changes over time.

calendar.title: Calendar View
calendar.subtitle: Track your daily activities and health metrics
calendar.noEntriesRecorded: No entries recorded for this day
calendar.noDataAvailable: No data available for this day

profile.title: Profile Setup
profile.subtitle: Configure your personal information for accurate calorie calculations
profile.profileUpdatedSuccess: Profile updated successfully! Your calorie calculations will now be more accurate. üéâ
profile.bmrInfo: BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate): Calories your body burns at rest
profile.tdeeInfo: TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure): BMR + activity level multiplier
profile.accurateTracking: Accurate tracking: Helps determine if you're in a calorie deficit or surplus
profile.privacy: Privacy: This data is stored securely and only used for your calculations
profile.personalInformationDesc: Enter your details for accurate calorie calculations
profile.activityLevelHint: This affects your daily calorie burn calculation
profile.previewDesc: See how your settings affect calorie calculations
profile.tdeeExplanation: TDEE = your daily calorie burn without exercise
profile.exerciseExplanation: Exercise calories are added on top of this
profile.deficitExplanation: Deficit = consuming less than total burn
profile.surplusExplanation: Surplus = consuming more than total burn
profile.enterDetails: Enter your birth date, gender, and height
profile.seePreview: to see your calorie calculation preview
profile.extremelyActive: Extremely Active - Very hard exercise, physical job

subscription.title: Subscription & Usage
subscription.subtitle: Manage your subscription and monitor usage limits
subscription.subscriptionActivated: Your subscription has been activated successfully. You now have unlimited access to all features. It may take a few moments for your premium status to update.
subscription.canUpgradeAnytime: You can upgrade to premium anytime by clicking the "Upgrade Now" button below.
subscription.unlimitedAccess: You have unlimited access to all features
subscription.getUnlimitedAccess: Get unlimited access to all features
subscription.limitsExplanation: Usage limits reset on the first day of each month. AI calculations count each time we analyze your food for macronutrients. Image uploads count each photo you add to entries.
subscription.cancelExplanation: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have premium access until the end of your billing period.
subscription.whatHappensToData: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
subscription.downgradeExplanation: All your existing data remains safe and accessible. You'll just be subject to the free tier limits for new activities going forward.

home.logMeals: Log your meals for calories consumed
